## HistoryExtension.keys() method

Adds the default key mappings for undo and redo.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
keys(): {
        ['Mod-y']: CommandFunction<any>;
        'Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
        'Shift-Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
    } | {
        'Mod-y': () => boolean;
        'Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
        'Shift-Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`{
        ['Mod-y']: CommandFunction<any>;
        'Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
        'Shift-Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
    } | {
        'Mod-y': () => boolean;
        'Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
        'Shift-Mod-z': CommandFunction<any>;
    }`
